description: Lists the source views (managed Amazon Web Services billing views) associated with the billing view.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: sourceViews
nested_items.description: A list of billing views used as the data source for the custom billing view.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that is used on subsequent calls to list billing views.
